ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision video CMOS security camera. Signal System: NTSC standard
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV lines
IR Illuminators: 36 infrared LED. Camera Lens: 6.0mm
Package included: 4 x security cameras with brackets, 4 x video power cables, 1 x 12V DC 4 channel power supply and 4 x bonus security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 x CCTV Outdoor Day Night Vision Bullet Security Cameras Infrared Color Video Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Extension Cables CTJ
